price: I oni se zamisliše, pa sami sebi rekoše: “Vi ste, zaista, nepravedni!”
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
